title: AzureGod
author: AzureGod
created_time: December 20, 2022, 07:52:57 PMLast edit: December 20, 2022, 10:06:45 PM by AzureGod
content: Status:  Available!We will never ask payment upfront, Payment is always after passing the exam then we close deal!https://i.imgur.com/4B7ORW6.gifhttps://i.imgur.com/4pjEtci.gifhttps://i.imgur.com/BNPlJPf.gifhttps://i.imgur.com/f4mg1LA.gifhttps://i.imgur.com/b4d3VuF.gifHow does it work?* You plan you exam and send us the date* We will install our software (not a RAT) on your device* You wil check-in for the exam, and just stay and we finish the jobQuestions:Q: can they find out what i am doing?A: No, we do not use a tool that can be find out later.Q: Is it 100% success rate? A: 100%, No cure, you get fully refund.Q: do you do all exams?A: No not all exams we do contact us and we see what you can get.List of certification:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/certifications/browse/Google   Google Cloud, Associate Cloud Engineer, Google Cloud- Professional Cloud Architect, Google Cloud Certified - Professional Data Engineer, Google cloud- Associate Cloud Engineer,  Google Cloud- Professional Cloud Architect,  Google Cloud Certified - Professional Data Engineer and Many moreMicrosoft     MCSEMCSAAZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator, AZ-120: Planning and Administering Microsoft Azure for SAP Workloads, AZ-204: Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure, AZ-220: Microsoft Azure IoT Developer, AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions, AZ-500: Microsoft Azure Security Technologies, AZ-900: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals Many moreEC-council     CEH, CHFI, ECSA, CCISOISACA  CISM, CISA, CRISC, CGEITOther certifications available    Palo Alto- All certifications, Cisco- All certifications, ITIL- All certifications, PMP- All certifications, PRINCE2- All certifications, CompTIA- All certifications, Oracle- All certifications, AWS-All certifications, Azure-All certifications, VMware-All certifications, Juniper-All certifications, Google-All certifications, Saleforce-All certificationsProof:https://i.imgur.com/xhXBpBu.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/VWdbDus.pngMore Exams!* 220-1001: CompTIA A+ Certification Exam: Core 1* 220-1002: CompTIA A+ Certification Exam: Core 2* 220-901: CompTIA A+ (220-901)* 220-902: CompTIA A+ (220-902)* SY0-401: CompTIA Security+* SY0-501: CompTIA Security+* SY0-601: CompTIA Security+ 2021

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: This is a type of cheating for these certifications. That's why there's an exam to test your knowledge what you actually know. It's a professional certificate and AFAIK, there's an oath that before taking an exam, you should be true to yourself and there's no way that you'll cheat on these certifications.It's okay if it's just like a review or study before the exam but, if doing this on the actual time of exam day, that's cheating.

comments.author: AzureGod
comments.body: Quote from: batang_bitcoin on December 20, 2022, 10:04:07 PMThis is a type of cheating for these certifications. That's why there's an exam to test your knowledge what you actually know. It's a professional certificate and AFAIK, there's an oath that before taking an exam, you should be true to yourself and there's no way that you'll cheat on these certifications.It's okay if it's just like a review or study before the exam but, if doing this on the actual time of exam day, that's cheating.I never told nobody needs to learn, we help people, who struggle the exam. Going to an exam without learning is not a smart idea.. We know what answers they will get and what trick questions there is. And that's the way we help the candidate.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: AzureGod on December 20, 2022, 10:10:18 PMQuote from: batang_bitcoin on December 20, 2022, 10:04:07 PMThis is a type of cheating for these certifications. That's why there's an exam to test your knowledge what you actually know. It's a professional certificate and AFAIK, there's an oath that before taking an exam, you should be true to yourself and there's no way that you'll cheat on these certifications.It's okay if it's just like a review or study before the exam but, if doing this on the actual time of exam day, that's cheating.I never told nobody needs to learn, we help people, who struggle the exam. Going to an exam without learning is not a smart idea.. We know what answers they will get and what trick questions there is. And that's the way we help the candidate. Well, I understand your generosity but that's not the way it should be. Learners and students or professionals that wants to get those type of certifications should really pave their way in obtaining one and be prepared of it. And in your case, as you've said that it's a 100% that someone will pass, this isn't the type of service that they should avail. It's a leak, it'll make them dependent on it and could take the certification and go out in the real world incompetent.
